description.value:
Renders a breadcrumb based on the current route history.

See the [Navigation Shell Example](../kiwi-navigation-shell/readme.md) for how to manipulate the breadcrumb.

attributes.name: active-class
attributes.description:
If set to true will append class 'active' to the `a` element if the current
route equals `routeKey`. Alternatively provide a string which is used as
active class instead.
When set to false, no class will be attached (default).

attributes.name: custom-class
attributes.description: Additional css to be applied to the underlying `a` element.

attributes.name: route-key
attributes.description: The key of the route config this link should be built off of.

attributes.name: active-class
attributes.description: Class added to elements marked with `data-shell-active="your-route"`
